description:
Sinners shall reap their rewards.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Even If Something Has Already Happened, You Can Still Choose What You Do.
Malgré les actions passées, le futur reste ouvert.
Nanika ga Okotte Shimatta Ato de Atte mo, Nani o Suru ka wa Jibun de Sentaku Dekiru.
何かが起こってしまった後であっても, 何をするかは自分で選択できる.
